description: When the wind is whistling around your ears on a mountaineering trip or ski tour, the Aenergy wind jacket will protect you from chilling. It is made from the very lightweight and robust Pertex® Equilibrium material. As well as repelling both wind and water, this material is also breathable and feels good on the skin. The adjustable hood is helmet-compatible and the hem width can be adjusted using a drawstring. Highly elasticated inserts on the inside ensure on optimum fit on the forearms. If you don’t happen to need the jacket, you can pack it up for compact storage in the zipper chest pocket. The Aenergy Windbreaker is so lightweight, practical and compressible you can take it with you on all your mountain adventures.
name: Mammut Aenergy WB Hooded Jacket - Mens
